title: Comparisons
description: Used for site comparisons, such as products, cards, rooms, flights, etc.

xdm:comparisonAddition.title: Comparison Addition
xdm:comparisonAddition.description: Tracked when an item is added to a comparison.

xdm:comparisonCount.title: Comparison Count
xdm:comparisonCount.description: Count of the total number of items being compared.

xdm:comparisonItems.title: Comparison List Items
xdm:comparisonItems.description: An array of all item IDs/SKUs in the list of products.

xdm:comparisonRemoval.title: Comparison Removal
xdm:comparisonRemoval.description: Tracked when an item is removed from a comparison.

xdm:comparisonType.title: Comparison Type
xdm:comparisonType.description: Type of comparison tool in use.

xdm:comparisonView.title: Comparison View
xdm:comparisonView.description: Tracked when a comparison page is viewed.

xdm:comparisonImpressions.title: Comparison Impressions
xdm:comparisonImpressions.description: Extension of the impressions data type.
